data.eml:eml: Quill mites (Acari: Prostigmata: Syringophilidae) from African passeriform birds

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skoracki, Maciej, Sikora, Bozena (2003): Quill mites (Acari: Prostigmata: Syringophilidae) from African passeriform birds. Zootaxa 129: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156817
